name: Ext_R4_TestScript_se_ac_as_resource
title: Cross-version Extension for R4.TestScript.setup.action.assert.resource for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents TestScript.setup.action.assert.resource from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/TestScript|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.definition: The type of the resource.  See http://build.fhir.org/resourcelist.html.
element.comment: `TestScript.setup.action.assert.resource` maps to R5 `TestScript.setup.action.assert.resource`.  `resource` removed the required value set binding to `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/defined-types|4.3.0`. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.definition: The type of the resource.  See http://build.fhir.org/resourcelist.html.
element.comment: `TestScript.setup.action.assert.resource` maps to R5 `TestScript.setup.action.assert.resource`.  `resource` removed the required value set binding to `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/defined-types|4.3.0`. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: A list of all the concrete types defined in this version of the FHIR specification - Data Types and Resource Types.
